title: I am unable to login to my account HELP!
body:
Hello my cousin has an account which he has spent a lot of time and money on but suddenly his account details are not working. They were working before he logged off of the game but when he tried loging in with the same details he was unable 

PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: We can help your cousin out!  Just have him reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will take a look.  Keep in mind that our team won't be able to correspond with you specifically if you're not the owner.  We'll get back to him as soon as we can!
Reset the password of the account.
No password change is being sent to the email
Then you should contact Riot Support ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us ).
They can't reply instantly. You will have to wait a couple hours.
I have waited still no reply please help
It usually take a couple hours for your request to be sent and about a day before someone from Riot reads and replies back to your ticket.
